_metadata.description: Interactive UI dashboard for visualizing knowledge system health and exploring semantic relationships

requirements.title: Dashboard UI framework
requirements.description: React + Vite UI with Matrix-style mission control aesthetic per PRD style guidelines
requirements.notes: Dark theme, technical typography, dashboard layout with subtle animations

requirements.title: Health metrics visualization
requirements.description: Real-time display of knowledge quality metrics with visual indicators and trends
requirements.notes: Show coherence, freshness, redundancy scores per collection and overall

requirements.title: Interactive knowledge graph
requirements.description: Visual graph component showing concept relationships with interactivity (zoom, pan, click)
requirements.notes: Support up to 1000 nodes with acceptable performance

requirements.title: Search interface
requirements.description: Search input with real-time results display and semantic similarity scores
requirements.notes: Support collection filtering and result limits

requirements.title: Dashboard accessibility
requirements.description: WCAG AA compliance with keyboard navigation support

requirements.title: UI smoke test
requirements.description: Production bundle loads successfully with iframe bridge ready
requirements.notes: Browserless captures screenshot, console, network artifacts
